org.easybatch.jpa

Class JpaRecordReader<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.jpa.JpaRecordReader<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of objects this reader will read.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordReader

    public class JpaRecordReader<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordReader
    Read records using the Java Persistence API.

    This reader produces GenericRecord instances with JPA entities as payload.

    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)

      • JpaRecordReader

        public JpaRecordReader(javax.persistence.EntityManagerFactory entityManagerFactory,
               java.lang.String query,
               java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Reader that reads data using the Java Persistence API.

        This reader produces GenericRecord instances with JPA entities as payload.

        Parameters:
        entityManagerFactory - the entity manager factory
        query - the JPQL query to fetch data
        type - the target type
